BEFORE: self.time_embeddings = nn.Embedding(num_timesteps, dim)  # also offer a continuous version of timestep embeddings, with a 2 layer MLP
AFTER: self.time_embeddings = nn.Embedding(num_timesteps, dim) if exists(num_timesteps) else nn.Sequential(Rearrange('b -> b 1'), MLP(1, dim)) # also offer a continuous version of timestep embeddings, with a 2 layer MLP
